title: FS: NEW 50 Card Lot of Low Grade T206 w/ HOF's and SL's **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: FS: NEW 50 Card Lot of Low Grade T206 w/ HOF's and SL's **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards available for sale or trade. As you can see by the scans, most of these are low grade cards and are priced accordingly. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards...3 or more ship for free. I accept payment via any method you prefer and will gladly consider trades for anything that I need from any other sets. I collect just about everything. Thanks for looking and please feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] with any questions or to reserve cards.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Abstein (pinhole in lower center) - $13
Bastian - $35

The rest of the scans.  Thanks for looking!
Bump for a price drop on all remaining cards.  Thanks for looking!
PM sent on Karger and Lentz
One last bump for a final price drop before these go to eBay.  I'd much rather sell them here to you guys!  Thanks for looking.
Marc, recieved the card yesterday.  Just wanted all members to know Marc was great to deal with!  Thanks again.

Marc,
